section.name: CLASSPATH
section.p: For using the basic function of Seasar2(S2Container, S2AOP), you need to include the following files in CLASSPATH.
For using the extended function of Seasar2(S2JTA, S2DBCP, S2JDBC, S2Unit, S2Tx, and S2DataSet), you need to include the following files in CLASSPATH.
